channel.title: Career on Rotational Labs
channel.description: Recent content in Career on Rotational Labs

item.title: How to Manage Overwhelm
item.description: Each morning, I make the mistake of checking social media before getting out of bed. As I catch up on what’s happening in the world, I often find myself thinking “This too much” all before 8 AM.

item.title: My First Year as a Junior Developer at Rotational Labs
item.description: 🎉 I just celebrated my first year as a junior developer. In this post, I’ll share some of the things I’ve learned and techniques I’ve grown to value over the last twelve months.
